body.p: Here are some classic, crowd-favorite recipes. You may use these recipes, or you may do your own research and find recipes you would like to try. For reference, here is a Cuisinart Recipe Guide: https://www.cuisinart.com/share/pdf/manuals/ice-100.pdf Note that the Recipe Guide is specific to the Cuisinart ICE-100, so there may be some variations. You will still be able to use these recipes with the ICE-60W with just a few alterations.
